long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Spendlo helps you spend less on online shopping by actually helping you stick to your budget. Unlike other tools that require you to actively check your budget, Spendlo shows you your budget right before you decide whether you want to make an online purchase. We believe that providing this information in-context can help people make better shopping decisions and keep more money in their pocket!

So how does it work?

Download the Spendlo extension and sign in using Facebook, Google, or Email
Set a budget for the max amount you want to spend on online shopping each month
Spendlo will recognize when you’re on a shopping cart or checkout page and proactively show you how much of your budget you have left to help you make more informed shopping decisions
Check and edit your budget and recent transactions any time by clicking on the Spendlo chrome extension to access Budget View

To learn more about Spendlo, including why it was built, how to edit transactions, how data is stored, and more about our non-profit mission, visit www.getspendlo.com.
